definition: to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage

sentences.english: Then do the same for your business or your career.
sentences.chinese: 那麼接下來請推及到你的職業生涯和生意中。

sentences.english: Computer simulation results of trajectory extrapolation and error estimation are also given in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文還給出了彈道外推及誤差估計的計算機模擬結果。

sentences.english: It is fantastic because human beings know to apply human psychology to subhuman animals.
sentences.chinese: 此招妙就妙在人將自己的心理推及到了類人的動物。

sentences.english: I think this applies to most areas of life.
sentences.chinese: 我想這個也可以推及到生活的其他領域。

sentences.english: So if it's so easy to imagine that for the rat, why not for us?
sentences.chinese: 即然能簡單地想老鼠，爲何不能推及人？

sentences.english: I applied that conjecture to episodes of inflation and deflation.
sentences.chinese: 我將此推測推及到通貨膨脹和通貨緊縮之中。

definition: love to all creatures (idiom, from Mencius); universal benevolence
to be all the same way (literary)
to study/to examine/to probe/to study the underlying principles
to re-use/to adapt (for another purpose)/to copy
to deteriorate/to decline/to slump/also written 凌夷
